actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to prescribe certain definitions to be used by the Secretary of Labor for purposes of the program established by chapter 41 of such title with respect to job counseling, training, and placement services for veterans.

summary.text: Amends certain provisions of existing law concerning veterans' job counseling, training, and placement services to: (1) limit "eligible veterans" to honorably discharged veterans who served in a period of war or a period for which a campaign badge was issued (including Vietnam-era veterans); and (2) include within "eligible veterans" those veterans with a service-connected or non-service connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to prescribe certain definitions to be used by the Secretary of Labor for purposes of the program established by chapter 41 of such title with respect to job counseling, training, and placement services for veterans.
